title: First Runner-Up, Huskies Hackathon
description: Collaborated in a team of 3 to build Candy Finder, a Halloween-themed web app to find, rate, and add houses with candy. Developed using React, Node.js, and Vercel; deployed a fully functional MVP within 24 hours.

title: Business Student Executive Council Scholarship
description: Awarded for outstanding academic performance and leadership contributions to the university community.

title: First Place, National Robotics Competition
description: Led a team to victory in the Robo-Soccer competition. Built a Bluetooth-controlled robot accessible via mobile phone, demonstrating technical innovation and teamwork.

title: Full-Ride Engineering Scholarship
description: Awarded for exceptional academic performance and top ranking in the highly competitive Institute of Engineering entrance exam. Recognized for academic excellence and leadership potential in engineering.
